    • Method Detail

      • loadWall

        public static processing.core.PImage[] loadWall(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads the images for the different tile types
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet object for which images are loaded with
        Returns:
        an array of images, containing a solid wall, broken wall, empty tile, goal tile in order.

      • loadBomb

        public static processing.core.PImage[][] loadBomb(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads the images for the bomb sprites
        Parameters:
        app - app which images are loaded with
        Returns:
        a 2d array of images, with the array containing bomb sprites and second array containing explosion sprites for each direction

      • loadBombGuy

        public static processing.core.PImage[][] loadBombGuy(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads the images for the BombGuy sprites
        Parameters:
        app - app which images are loaded with
        Returns:
        a 2d array of images, with the each array containing a cycle array of sprites for a particular cardinal direction. Order of arrays is left, right, up and down

      • loadRed

        public static processing.core.PImage[][] loadRed(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads the images for the Red enemy sprites
        Parameters:
        app - app which images are loaded with
        Returns:
        a 2d array of images, with the each array containing a cycle array of sprites for a particular cardinal direction. Order of arrays is left, right, up and down

      • loadYellow

        public static processing.core.PImage[][] loadYellow(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads the images for the Yellow enemy sprites
        Parameters:
        app - app which images are loaded with
        Returns:
        a 2d array of images, with the each array containing a cycle array of sprites for a particular cardinal direction. Order of arrays is left, right, up and down

      • loadUI

        public static processing.core.PImage[] loadUI(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads the images for the UI
        Parameters:
        app - app which images are loaded with
        Returns:
        an array of two images, first image being the playerhead image and second image being the clock sprite
